title: Facebook’s Troubles And Policy Changes Are More About Trump Than About Facebook
text: In response to hate speech, racism and, likely, Donald Trump, Coca-Cola, Verizon Unilever and other companies are pulling ads from Facebook and, to some extent Twitter, causing Facebook stock to plunge more than 8% of Friday.

title: Mark Zuckerberg loses $7.2B over major advertising boycotts on Facebook
text: Billionaire Mark Zuckerberg took a $7.2 billion hit after several companies pulled their advertising from Facebook, citing the company’s failure to police hate speech and disinformation on its site.

title: The Facebook ad boycotts have entered the big leagues. Now what?
text: Facebook is facing a snowball effect of advertisers signing onto the boycott, with big names Verizon and Unilever signing on late this week.

title: Facebook to flag 'newsworthy' posts that violate terms, including Trump's
text: Facebook has said it will flag posts from "newsworthy" politicians that break its rules, including those from US President Donald Trump.
